name: Tap'n Lucky
description:
This is a lottery simulation game, which is enhanced from LITE version. (No longer Ads appear.)

You can draw of lots 10times per one game.
But, unfortunately, there are No Awards by this lottery game.

You can select a character.
Each character has different lottery rate.

Rates are:
[ UN-chan ]
Extreme-Rare : 1 %
Rare : 9 %
Normal : 30 %
Boo : 60 %

[ Mr. Kongou ]
Extreme-Rare : 0.35 %
Rare : 4.65 %
Normal : 30 %
Boo : 65 %

The result of drawing will change the result scene.
Mr. Kongou's lottery rate is very severe,
so could you open the gate at result scene?

Let's check your luck, good luck !
